description: Developed and customized Shopify themes using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Shopify Liquid for B2B, consumer-facing, subscription services, and one-time purchase businesses.
Enhanced site functionality and client satisfaction by integrating third-party services such as ReCharge, Rebuy, Klaviyo, Yotpo, and Okendo.
Conducted thorough UI/UX/ADA testing using manual methods and tools like Lambda and PopeTech, ensuring accessibility and usability standards were met.

Led the web redesign for an enterprise-level ERP software development company, increasing page impressions by over 2,000 per month and implementing translation services for thousands of monthly visitors.

Designed modern accessibility features for 3,500 monthly users across desktop, mobile, and tablet platforms, ensuring seamless user experiences through responsive layouts and custom WordPress components using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.
Utilized Figma to create a scalable design system, enhancing visual coherence and user engagement by meticulously managing composition, color, illustration, and typography.

Developed a comprehensive web application tool for Arizona State University to measure social network behaviors and quantify collaborative research efforts, delivering detailed insights into multi-million dollar revenue streams.
Partnered with various departments to demonstrate advanced methods for manipulating, processing, cleaning, and aggregating large-scale datasets using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Python, and Pandas.
Led post-implementation reviews with users and faculty to evaluate project success, document feedback, and implement improvements, enhancing visual transparency and user accessibility.
